internship.description: Here are strategies to optimize for internships:
strategies: Take the minimum 3 courses per module to leave one module free for internships.
Choose weekend courses to allow 4 days of internships per week.
Consider MSBA 7037: A/B testing for Shenzhen-based internships.
Have classmates check attendance if needed, but avoid excessive absences.
